resources.string: Detects a trigger word and sends SOS Message

Easily trigger an SOS message by setting a trigger word. Once detected, your app will automatically send an SOS message to selected contacts with your live location, even when the app is running in the background or the phone is locked
Stay safe 24/7 with this powerful feature

Our team is currently developing a customizable lock screen feature. This will help you to set custom pin and pattern in your lock screen, allowing you to send SOS Message and current location from lock screen itself, making it faster and easier to send SOS Message and current location.
If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to our support team. Download Kavach today and take control of your personal safety.

Your safety is our top priority. We are dedicated to continuously enhancing and updating Kavach to provide you with the most effective and reliable safety tool. We value your feedback and encourage you to share your thoughts and suggestions as we strive to make your experience better every day.

We have integrated advanced speech recognition technology into our app. Now, you will be able to activate the SOS feature just by speaking a trigger word, making it even easier to reach out for help when your hands are occupied.
With a single press of a button, instantly send SOS messages to your designated emergency contacts. Your loved ones will be alerted of your distress and your live location, ensuring swift assistance.
Welcome to Kavach, your personal safety companion designed to provide you with peace of mind in any emergency situation. Our mission is to keep you safe and connected at all times.

Fire : 101 
 Ambulance : 102 
 Road Accident Emergency Service : 1073 
 Railway Accident Emergency Service : 1072 
 Police : 100 or 112 
 Disaster Management Services : 108 
 National Emergency Number : 112 
 Women’s Helpline : 1091 
 Women’s Helpline (Domestic Abuse) : 181 
 Children In Difficult Situation : 1098 
 Senior Citizen Helpline : 14567 
 Cyber Crime Helpline : 155620 
 Kisan Call Centre : 18001801551 
 Aids Helpline : 1097 
 Air Ambulance 9540161344
